text: Tak My spryamuvaly vashu hromadu na seredniy shlyakh, shchob vy buly svidkamy dlya lyudey, a Poslanets聞 shchob buv svidkom dlya vas. Poperednyu kyblu My zrobyly lyshe dlya toho, shchob diznatysya, khto pide za Poslantsem, a khto vidvernet聞sya vid n聞oho. Tse bulo vazhkoyu spravoyu, okrim yak dlya tykh, koho Allah poviv shlyakhom pryamym. Allah nikoly ne zrobyt聞 marnoyu viru vashu, adzhe Allah Lahidnyy ta Myloserdnyy do lyudey
